description:
Subaru and Emilia wait at the bookstore for the rest of the gang`s arrival to take advantage of an exciting new release!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Re: Petit - Re: Petit kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Petit 14 - Tada Sore dake no Senden
